name: Programed To Love
description:
Programed To love

You play as a robot who is on a quest to find true love.

This is a 2D platformer with a grapple hook mechanic where you will be collecting flowers and giving them to potential love interests in hopes of finding the one.

This game was made for the “ACORN JAM #1”

The theme of the jam was “Artificial Life”

The Twist of the jam was “Only Four”

Controls:

Move:   WASD

Jump:  Space 

Aim Up:  W

Shoot:  E

It is recommended you play in full screen.
